Test Name: Metagenomic Sequencing of Bacteria, Virus, Fungus, and Parasite in Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To detect and identify bacterial, viral, fungal, and parasitic pathogens in spinal fluid through comprehensive metagenomic sequencing.
Container: Sterile, leak-proof spinal fluid collection tube (e.g., polypropylene screw-cap tube)
Equipment: Illumina sequencing platform (MiSeq or NextSeq), Qubit Fluorometer, NanoDrop Spectrophotometer, Bioanalyzer or TapeStation
